summary: Adds a rebindable torch hotkey. Default is \'\\\'.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Torch Hotkey

Version: 1.05 Beta

By: JustinOther

Description: Adds a rebindable torch hotkey to free a vanilla hotkey. There is no longer a default, but it can be bound to whichever key you choose when first loading the mod. The hotkey can be rebound by pressing and holding the current hotkey upon loading a save.

v1.03b Requirements: Skyrim v1.6.89.0+, Skyrim Script Extender v1.6.0+ available at: http://skse.silverlock.org/

Get the beta 1.6.1: http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1409318-wipz-skyrim-script-extender-skse/page__view__findpost__p__21599876

Install: Place the ESP and BSA in your Skyrim\\Data directory and activate the plugin with your launcher or favorite load order utility.

Uninstall:  Deactivate the plugin and/or delete the ESP and BSA.

Conflicts/Load Order: There are no overrides, so load it ...wherever.
Rights: I\'m a lefty. Do ...whatever.

Thanks: Beth for the game and Creation Kit. SKSE Team for Skyrim Script extender.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: JustinOther
